author: Lon.TV
description:
I've been buying games digitally since the Xbox 360 Release 20 years ago. All of those games are still accessible to me (even the delisted ones) but my iPhone game purchases did not fare as well, with many now completely inaccessible - some with no record of the purchase at all! See more like this: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsJJ0Gy1ENvGjbCp7PslRyz and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:15 - SNK Pulling Purchased Games from Google Play
01:09 - Sponsor: Oclean
02:23 - Stop Killing Games Petition
05:01 - How are my 20 years of digital purchases doing?
05:58 - Xbox 360 Purchases from 2005/2006
09:07 - My Old Steam Games
09:39 - Old GOG Games
10:05 - Nintendo 3DS Store?
10:54 - My Missing Purchased iPhone Games
11:33 - EA's Simcity Rugpull
13:57 - THQ's Trench Run
14:35 - Adult Swim Games
15:41 - Internet Archive to the Rescue

Visit my Blog! https://blog.lon.tv

Subscribe to my email lists! 
Weekly Breakdown of Posted Videos:  - https://lon.tv
title: Digital Games 20 Years Later: Apple wiped many of my purchases! #stopkillinggames
